Explanations about Options.-loglevel(M): Set logging level and flags used by the library.
Explanations about Options.-select_streams(M):
Select only the streams specified by stream_specifier. This option affects only the
 options related to streams (e.g. "show_streams", "show_packets", etc.).
Explanations about Options.-show_entries(M): Set list of entries to show.

Explanations about Options.-i(M):
Causes the file command to output mime type strings rather than the more traditional
 human readable ones. Thus it may say ‘text/plain; charset=us-ascii’ rather than
 “ASCII text”.

Answers.Most Similar TLDR Task: Determine the mime encoding type of a file

so_25773929: for file in *.{flv,avi,mp3,mkv}; do
        target="${file%.*}.mp4"
        [[ -f "$target" ]] && { echo "skipping $file - $target exists" ; continue; }
        echo ffmpeg -r 15  -i "$file"  -b 296k -s 640x320 -vcodec mpeg4 -acodec aac "$target"
done

au_369947: -i video.mp4  -> first media file
-i audio.aac  -> second media file
-map 0:1      -> use the second stream from the first mediafile
-map 1:0      -> use the first stream from the second mediafile
-vcodec copy  -> leave the video as is
-acodec copy  -> leave the audio as is
newvideo      -> resulting videofile
